charges.charge_description: 18:1344A.F BANK FRAUD-That beginning in 8/02 and continuing to 11/02 at or near Schenectady, in the State and NDNY, and elsewhere, the deft knowingly executed and attempted to execute a scheme and artifice to defraud financial institution where the deft wrote and negotiated checks totaling at least $7, 000 against checking accounts at said banks knowing that said cheding accounts were closed. (1)
Viol. of T18, USC Sec 1344; knowingly executed or attempted to execute a scheme to defraud a financial institution. [1:02-m-443]
